meanings.definition: A person who engages in physical activity to improve health or fitness.
meanings.sent1: The exerciser went for a run every morning to stay healthy.
meanings.sent2: She is a dedicated exerciser who enjoys going to the gym regularly.
meanings.sent3: The funny exerciser tried doing jumping jacks with a hula hoop.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to be a better exerciser was like a flame that never went out.
meanings.sent5: The image of the exerciser sweating and smiling stuck in my mind.

meanings.definition: A device or machine used for physical exercise.
meanings.sent1: The exerciser at the gym helps strengthen different muscle groups.
meanings.sent2: The new exerciser in the fitness center was easy to use.
meanings.sent3: The exerciser made a funny noise when it was turned on.
meanings.sent4: The exerciser hummed like a content bee during the workout.
meanings.sent5: The shiny exerciser gleamed under the gym lights.
